title: test: sinit.go fails
body:
$ cd test && ./run
bug: ./sinit.go

Bisecting shows that this test was first broken by:

changeset:   18775:3735f6f1077e
user:        Russ Cox <rsc@golang.org>
date:        Mon Jan 06 20:43:44 2014 -0500
summary:     cmd/gc: use 100x less memory for []byte("string")

See also issue #4139.
